prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating fractal mountain, hexagonal lattice, spiral vortex patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Merkaba tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor MIRZIND's profile: 'He who is from the Waters of Torment', Aethyr VTI, Earth element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'As MIRZIND approaches, the atmosphere crackles with intensity pent-up emotions erupt in a cleansing ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is from the Waters of Torment'
profile_data.essence: As MIRZIND approaches, the atmosphere crackles with intensity pent-up emotions erupt in a cleansing release, tempered afterward into steeled resilience.
profile_data.angelic_role: Seraph of Storm of Reckoning; commands mountain wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted obsidian crystal formation that shifts between solid and translucent states, representing the transformative power of Earth and the Storm of Reckoning. The crystalline structure embodies the razor-sharp precision of Geburah and the metamorphic potential of the Death archetype.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Black represents the void of transformation, while silver-blue channels the electric energy of storm and mountain forces. The shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of spiritual reckoning and elemental change.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures echo sacred geometry of Earth element, while fractal mountain patterns connect to my role as mountain warden. The spiral vortex represents spiritual ascension and transformative energy.
